logic.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • logic.map.Cell
        • logic.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends Cell
    This Class is currentPlayer, which includes users and NPCs.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Kai QI

      • generateTotalHp

        public void generateTotalHp()
        The method is used to generate totalHp according to the D20 rule. The method is called when the currentPlayer object is edited or created. The method also is called when the level changes. The method also is called when the CON modifier changed, aka, when the type changes.

      • getAbilityModifier

        Returns:
        Integer ,the value of the modifier
